org.qcri.rheem.core.util

Class JsonSerializables

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.util.JsonSerializables

  • public class JsonSerializables
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility to deal with JsonSerializables.

      • serialize

        public static java.lang.Object serialize(java.lang.Object obj,
                                         boolean isPolymorph)
        Try to serialize the given Object. It must be JSON-compatible or a JsonSerializable.
        Parameters:
        obj - the Object to serialize
        isPolymorph - in case a JSONObject is created, whether it should be tagged with the Class of obj
        Returns:
        the serialization result
        See Also:
        isJsonCompatible(Object)

      • serializeAll

        public static org.json.JSONArray serializeAll(java.util.Collection<?> collection,
                                              boolean isPolymorph)
        Try to serialize the given Objects. They must be JSON-compatible or a JsonSerializables.
        Parameters:
        collection - the Objects to serialize
        isPolymorph - in case a JSONObject is created, whether it should be tagged with the Class of the according Object
        Returns:
        the serialization result
        See Also:
        isJsonCompatible(Object)

        serializer - the JsonSerializer
        Returns:
        the serialization result

      • deserialize

        public static java.lang.Object deserialize(java.lang.Object json)
        Deserialize a given JSON datatype. The following cases are supported:
        • json is a (JSON) null value;
        • json is a basic (JSON) datatype;
        • json is a Class-tagged JSONObject that corresponds to a JsonSerializable;
        • json is a JSONArray with Class-tagged JSONObjects that correspond to a JsonSerializables - in this case, the result type is a List.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON data
        Returns:
        the deserialization result

      • deserialize

        public static <T> T deserialize(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
        Deserialize a Class-tagged JSONObject that should correspond to a JsonSerializable.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - the JSONObject
        Returns:
        the deserialization product

      • addClassTag

        public static org.json.JSONObject addClassTag(java.lang.Object obj,
                                              org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
        Tag the JSONObject with the Class of the other Object.
        Parameters:
        obj - whose Class should be tagged
        jsonObject - that should be tagged
        Returns:
        the jsonObject

      • addClassTag

        public static org.json.JSONObject addClassTag(java.lang.Object obj,
                                              org.json.JSONObject jsonObject,
                                              boolean isAddClassTag)
        Optionally tag the JSONObject with the Class of the other Object.
        Parameters:
        obj - whose Class should be tagged
        jsonObject - that should be tagged
        isAddClassTag - if this is false, no action will be performed
        Returns:
        the jsonObject

      • getClassTag

        public static java.lang.Class<?> getClassTag(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
                                      throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Read and load the specified Class in a JSONObject.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - that contains the Class tag
        Returns:
        the loaded Class or null if none exists
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the Class could not be loaded

        Returns:

      • isUnconvertedInstance

        public static boolean isUnconvertedInstance(java.lang.Object obj)
        Tells whether the given instance does not require conversion, which is the case for Longs, Integers, Doubles, Strings, and nulls.
        Parameters:
        obj - the instance to test
        Returns:
        whether obj does not require conversion
